title: Can someone please get me some RP
body:
I would love it if someone would be kind enough to get me some RP i am  really poor and can buy any i would REALLY REALLY REALLY appreciate it if RIOT reads this and gives me a small amount  would be super happy soooo happy that i would flip a table and fight MEGA GNAR!!! Thanks for reading

replies.body: wtf get your own rp man, pretty sure you can have atleast have 10 dollars you spastic hobo. no one aint going to give you bloody rp mate

Hey THEGODAMNKOCKERY,

Begging for RP is the fastest way to not get anything while also annoying people. RP is not a necessity in this game, so if you don't have money to buy any I'd suggest learning to live without it.

However, there is some free content you can get. Check out Riot's [Promotional Content page here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202083184-Promotional-Content-Free-Swag-); on OCE you can get a free Garen with a skin, and Tristana with a skin. You also receive 400 RP when you reach level 3, and while it's not much, you can wait for some skins to go on sale for under that (or just purchase some of the content already that price).

Riot may give you small amounts of RP *one time only* if you create some unique League art for them and submit it in a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), though probably not enough alone for a skin.

-DTN
